quote: He who knows others is wise; he who knows himself is enlightened.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The only journey is the journey within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
author: Aristotle

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The curious paradox is that when I accept myself just as I am, then I can change.
author: Carl Rogers

quote: Until you make the unconscious conscious, it will direct your life and you will call it fate.
author: Carl Jung

quote: One way to boost our will power and focus is to manage our distractions instead of letting them manage us.
author: Daniel Goleman

quote: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: To find yourself, think for yourself.
author: Socrates

quote: Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
author: Carl Jung

quote: The greatest discovery of any generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitude.
author: William James

quote: The privilege of a lifetime is to become who you truly are.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: You must find the place inside yourself where nothing is impossible.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Without self-awareness we are as babies in the cradles.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Act the way you'd like to be and soon you'll be the way you act.
author: Leonard Cohen

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Awareness is the greatest agent for change.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Reflect upon your present blessings, of which every man has plenty; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
author: Plutarch

quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: We don’t see things as they are, we see them as we are.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: It's not what we have in life, but who we have in our life that matters.
author: Unknown

quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
author: Jane Goodall

quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Unknown

quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: You, as much as anyone in the universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: There is more to life than increasing its speed.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Learning is a gift. Even when pain is your teacher.
author: Maya Watson

quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Don’t be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Self-command is the main elegance.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: What is necessary to change a person is to change his awareness of himself.
author: Abraham Maslow

quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: A man cannot be comfortable without his own approval.
author: Mark Twain

quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
author: Plato

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
author: Buddha

quote: Choose to be optimistic, it feels better.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: To dare is to lose one’s footing momentarily. To not dare is to lose oneself.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large.
author: Confucius

quote: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
author: Bernard M. Baruch

quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors for you where there were only walls.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: You can’t go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
author: Joshua J. Marine

quote: Only in the darkness can you see the stars.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
author: Nido Qubein

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: You change the world by being yourself.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Find out who you are and do it on purpose.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
author: Robin Williams

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: What you seek is seeking you.
author: Rumi

quote: You are enough just as you are.
author: Meghan Markle

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: A happy soul is the best shield for a cruel world.
author: Atticus

quote: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The greatest mistake we make is living in constant fear that we will make one.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
author: Helen Keller

quote: What's done is done. What's gone is gone. One of life's lessons is always moving on.
author: Roy T. Bennett
